data.name: Phantom Alchemy ~Silvia's Dynamic Urban Planning~
data.detailed_description:
Phantom Alchemy ~Silvia's Dynamic Urban Planning~ is a Turn-Based J-RPG developed by Trynity Lab. and published by OTAKU Plan.

STORY

In order to make up for the corruption committed by her father, Silvia had to help the development of the border city as an alchemist.
But if she wants to use alchemy, she must convert the spiritual power of residents into energy.

To shoulder the mission, Silvia collected spiritual power while using Alchemy to enrich people's lives.
However, after gaining the recognition of the residents, Silvia accidentally discovered the [truth] of alchemy.

FEATURES

  • JRPG
  • Turn-Based command battle
  • Crafting system
  • Selective difficulty levels

data.short_description: In order to make up for the corruption committed by her father, Silvia had to help the development of the border city as an alchemist. But if she wants to use alchemy, she must convert the spiritual power of residents into energy.
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
